DEMO_005_AFT_SYS_001:
A strange machine appears to have crash landed here. 
There's a device inside that you've never seen before.
ā
It appears the device can be attached to your head. Would you like to try on the device and see what happens?Ă
DEMO_005_AFT_SYS_002: You placed the strange device back where you found it.
SANCHO_001:
̂I know you like your freedom, and that's why I cater to your every need, here in our little paradise, Master!
ā
If you get bored out here and are looking for more to do, just press the
X-button. You'll find some fun things in your menu, Master.
OP_NPC_MSG_001:
̂... Slurp. What's goooo-d, ȁ!?
How're you gooin' today, my main man!?
ā
Check it out, ȁ! You see all those crazy lookin' clouds up there? -slurp-
ā
If you hold down the Y-button and use your D-pad, you can check 'em
out! You can even use the C-stick if you've goo-t one!
ā
Goooo ahead and try it out, my main man!
OP_NPC_MSG_002:
̂When you feel lost, use the map on the bottom screen to navigate. You see that red "!" marker? You should go over there!
ā
And while you're at it, feel free to press the B-button along the way to jump around!
NPC_ANSESU_CORE_020:
́What's wrong, ȁ? Are you bored?
ā
Ohhh! Wanna go fishing? We could ask Sancho to lend us some rods...
ā
Geez, what is it? What's with that face? Something bothering you?
Ă
NPC_ANSESU_CORE_021:
́I see.Then you should take that frown off your face. You should always be smiling. Live happy.
ā
Happiness doesn't come around to people with a grimace.
NPC_ANSESU_CORE_050:
́... What's up with you today, ȁ. You're awfully grumpy today.
ā
Why are you like that. You should just be happy that there's peace.
ā
Small things could build up and cause fights. Please don't be that person.Ă
NPC_ANSESU_CORE_051: ́Glad you understand. Just watch what you do or say from now on.
NPC_SANCHO_CORE_010:
̂Master Anses just ventured off into the western woods...
ā
If you wish to see him, Master ȁ, why not go
and track him down?!
NPC_CORE_SLIME_A_020:
̂C'mon, ȁ! This is no goood! 
Don't listen to that thing! Let's hang here, forever!
NPC_SANCHO_CORE_020:
̂No, Master ȁ! You musn't listen to that
thing! It's trying to ruin our little Paradise!
ā
You must take it off, and destroy it! Hurry, Master!
NPC_RAKUEN01_CORE_REC: ̄Monster with a blue, jelly-like body. Looks like it's always smiling.
SYS_REACTOR_CORE_060:
̄This is a repeat warning.
ā
Abnormalities detected in surrounding lifeforms. Activate your Reactor and scan immediately.
NPC_ANSESU_CORE_REC_060: ̄ȁ's real brother. Lost his life in a fight a while ago...
NPC_SANCYO_CORE_REC_060: ̄Sancho is a robot that takes care of ȁ and the house.
NPC_CORE_SLIME_B_010:
̂How's it gooing, Master ȁ? Wanna splash around in the river with me today?
ā
There's nothing better than an ice-cold dip on a day like today! -slurp-
NPC_RAKUEN02_CORE_REC: ̄A round, furry monster. Lets out its sharp fangs when mad.
NPC_RAKUEN03_CORE_REC: ̄Flying gold Slime with wings. You might think it'll bring great fortune, but it doesn't.
NPC_RAKUEN04_CORE_REC: ̄Cute monster that looks like a plush toy. It is hiding sharp spines in its body.
NPC_CORE_ANGEL_A_010:
̂Hey, Master ȁ. I was gonna bake Sancho a cake later, for fun.
ā
I think you should come eat it with us. As long as I don't overcook it, that is!
NPC_CORE_ANGEL_A_020:
̂No, perhaps this isn't the best time! But, if you insist, let's bake that cake!
ā
That's our ȁ! Always ready to eat... even at the most inopportune times!
NPC_CORE_ANGEL_B_010: ̂I feel so sleepy... do you want join me for a nap?
NPC_CORE_JOBO_A_010:
̂No one can harm us here, Master ȁ.
ā
Anses is so strong, he can beat anyone down. He doesn't even need our help!
NPC_CORE_JOBO_A_020:
̂If you stay here, Anses will protect us. No need to put
yourself in harm's way anymore, right!?
ā
Please, you must not listen to that infernal device!
NPC_CORE_JOBO_B_010:
̂Master ȁ! How about another race!?
I'm not gonna lose to you this time!
NPC_CORE_PINK_A_010:
̂Oh hey, it's you, ȁ. You want a big hug again?
ā
Oh, you're looking for Anses? He went to the woods west from here.
NPC_CORE_PINK_A_020: ̂Don't be a bad boy. Or else you're not getting any more hugs from me.
NPC_CORE_PINK_B_010:
̂With Anses here, we'll never have to fight again!
ā
He's just going to protect all of us. Isn't that right, Master ȁ?
NPC_CORE_SLIME_A_010:
̂Wheee! -slurp-! Master ȁ! It's so peaceful here! I'm gooing to hang out here all day!
ā
I want to stay here forever... with you... and Anses...all of us together, all the time! -boing-
